text: @realDonaldTrump NJ and America are losing senior citizens every day. My uncle was 75, & my best friend’s dad was 71. My best friend & his dad both voted for you. My friend has #coronavirus from his dad & is disgusted by you and @FoxNews because this didn’t need to happen. You’re responsible!
